name: nudist
desc: { NAME } enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. They can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

name: bloodlust
desc: { NAME } gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death.

name: kind
desc: { NAME } is a nice person. They have a tendency to brighten everyone else's day and never insult others.

name: psychopath
desc: { NAME } has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother them at all.

name: cannibal
desc: { NAME } was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, they tried it... and they liked it.

name: abrasive
desc: { NAME } always says exactly what's on their mind, especially if it's bugging them. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

name: too-smart
desc: { NAME } is too smart for their own good. They learn everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

name: brawler
desc: { NAME } likes to fight up close and personal.

name: nimble
desc: { NAME } has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. They seem to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

name: fast-learner
desc: { NAME } has a knack for learning. They pick things up much faster than others.

name: slow-learner
desc: { NAME } is slow on the uptake. They pick things up much slower than others.

name: masochist
desc: For { NAME }, there's something exciting about getting hurt. They don't know why, they're just wired differently.

name: transhumanist
desc: { NAME } feels limited in their feeble human body.

name: body-purest
desc: { NAME } believes the human body is limited for a reason.

name: night-owl
desc: { NAME } likes to work at night.

name: greedy
desc: { NAME } has an excessive desire for wealth and/or power.

name: jealous
desc: { NAME } shows an envious resentment towards others more successful or advantaged.

name: ascetic
desc: { NAME } has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle.

name: asexual
desc: { NAME } has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

name: gay
desc: { NAME } is romantically attracted to people of their own gender.

name: bisexual
desc: { NAME } is romantically attracted to both men and women.

name: misandrist
desc: { NAME } really dislikes and distrusts men.

name: misogynist
desc: { NAME } really dislikes and distrusts women.

name: great-memory
desc: { NAME } has a fantastic memory for detail.

name: tough
desc: { NAME } has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones.

name: gourmand
desc: { NAME }'s life revolves around food.

name: quick-sleeper
desc: { NAME } doesn't need as much sleep as the average person.

name: annoying-voice
desc: { NAME }'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike them.

name: creepy-breathing
desc: { NAME } breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

name: pyromaniac
desc: { NAME } loves fire.

name: wimp
desc: { NAME } is weak and cowardly.

name: undergrounder
desc: { NAME } has no need to experience the outdoors or light.

name: tortured-artist
desc: { NAME } feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings.
